nodes.text: Deezoth Caraz was a slaver. He posed as an importer/exporter to cover up his chosen profession. He traveled with a bodyguard named Vok.

During the Galactic Civil War, he was on Ord Mynock with his bodyguard and two slaves he was to deliver to a Hutt crime lord. During this visit, while getting drunk and gambling, he was poisoned by Vok and died.
He had a loathsome personality. He was amoral and liked to intimidate others.
